title: Paul Brady - Trick Or Treat FLAC
description:
Paul Joseph Brady (born 19 May 1947 is an Irish singer-songwriter, whose work straddles folk and pop. He was interested in a wide variety of music from an early age. During his career he has passed through several major bands and on to a successful solo phase. Initially popular for playing traditional Irish music in a duo with Andy Irvine and later with Tommy Peoples and Matt Molloy, he later turned to a more rock inspired electric style with poignant political lyrics. Among his most popular songs are "Crazy Dreams", "Nothing but the Same Old Story", "The Island", "Night Hunting" (covered by Santana), "Steel Claw", and "Paradise is Here"(covered by Tina Turner).
Trick or Treat is his 6th solo album released in 1991.
